originalText.text: Humble, young, Bible-centered non-denominational church. Really love the community here and feels like home!

text.text: Humble, young, Bible-centered non-denominational church. Really love the community here and feels like home!

originalText.text: I've been attending Hope for a few years now, and I am so grateful to have found such a fantastic community here in NYC. The Hope pastors deliver great sermons every Sunday, and we have had some amazing guest speakers visit us from all over as well. The people I've met here at church are not only people I see on Sundays for service, but I genuinely consider them great friends. We do plenty of things together throughout the week as well, including meeting for small groups / bible study and volunteer opportunities throughout the city to not make church a once-a-week, passive activity. I also appreciate the resources Hope provides everyone with, from bible study to financial literacy and marriage courses. I feel truly blessed to be a part of this church and highly recommend it to others.

originalText.text: My first time at Hope was memorable. I left telling my hubby, ‚Äúthis is our soon to be church home‚Äù. Warmth and friendliness from the people, worship is amazing and I just fell in love with the flow of Hope Church EV! All my friends and family i invite, come back. ‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text:
I've been actively attending since Spring 2017. It's been my church home and community. We believe in the following and hope these values resonate with you as well. üôÇ Stopby and visit!

Living Deeply - We are committed to living out of the depth of our union and communion with Christ.

Living Neighborly - We are committed to joining God in loving and living intentionally for the well-being of our neighbors, both locally and globally.

Living Communally - We are committed to being shaped by, and living out, the gospel of Jesus Christ through life in authentic community.

Living Justly - We are committed to doing justice, living justly, and speaking prophetically for the sake of all who are oppressed in our neighborhood, in our city, and in our world.

Living Generously - We are committed to giving of all that we are and all that we have in response to God's abundant grace that has been poured out on us.

Living Restfully - We are committed to living lives of rest in the midst of a chaotic world.

Living Beautifully - We are committed to living lives that witness to the beauty of God by creatively generating beauty in our neighborhood.

Living Delightfully - We are committed to living lives full of celebration and joy.

originalText.text: Friendly family feel church that takes the time to know your name and ask how you are doing. First Sundays every month are reserved for food and fellowship which is a good place to meet other people interested in growing in faith.
